name: Tourist Bus/Mini Bus
daily_rent: Dhaka Metro City BDT 10000 to 15000 and out side Dhaka BDT 4000 to 5000 (Depend on the distance) Rental rates are excluding other cost e.g. fuel, toll, food and tour allowance.
monthly_rent: BDT 2,40,000 Rental rates are excluding other cost e.g. fuel, toll, food and tour allowance.
